name: FTC GmbH
goal:
We are one of the leading German trade compliance experts, advising international companies in the fields of customs, taxes, compliance, logistics and trade.
Our team is consisting of experienced and highly qualified customs and trade specialists (business lawyers and graduated customs experts).
Our target is to evaluate the individual needs of our internationally operating customers in order to provide customer-specific solutions for all challenges in international trade.
In the spirit of our mission, we act with high expertise, empathy and flexibility to meet our customers´ requirements.
Our mission is to develop practical solutions and to implement them in the companies´ processes as well as to enable our customers to increase their profits by better international competitiveness and entering new regions with their products and services.

Our Trade Compliance Solutions (consultancy) covers:
EU market access, market analyzes, sales promotion
International export control (US law included)
Origin and preferences (EU, CEFTA, SAP, ASEAN, NAFTA, PEM…)
Classification of goods
Special customs procedures (processing, customs warehousing ...)
Special features of the Unions Customs Code and WCO (World Customs Organization)
Process analysis, descriptions, workflows as well as their practical implementation
Organization of serial transactions and complex delivery relationships
Introduction of IT solutions for internal process optimization
Process and personnel analyzes to optimize human resources, workflow management and process engineering
AEO authorization: auditing, support and monitoring
Regular auditing / validation of trade processes
Supervision, evaluation and implementation of customs audits
"Trouble Shooting":
Conflict resolution with public authorities
Conception of official objections and statements on imminent criminal and fine proceedings
Application for reimbursement requests
